messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Dilemma update
messages.msgSnippet: That got sorted quickly in the end.  I had a chat with him and it turns out he had seen a different course that he was really, really into doing ( the online
messages.messageBody:
That got sorted quickly in the end. I had a chat with him and it turns out he had seen a different course that he was really, really into doing ( the online college had put up some new ones after he got his) but didn't want to say cos he had only just got the Egyptology. ( which he admitted he hates with a passion). I looked at the small print and realised he could transferred if we asked within six months - quick phone call and job done. One happy smiling boy again and one very relieved mum. Courses suck.

Ruth


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
